item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: = 400 career homeruns) and a comparison of there strikeouts. First, we must filter and summarize hitters that were able to hit 400 homeruns in their careers. This gives us a list of players who were able to hit 400 or more homeruns. Notice that we named this table "df" so that we can easily refer to it throughout. Next, we will join multiple tables together to make it easier to identify players.
